channel.title: New combat - No mage books, some other info
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/combat-action-and-adrenaline
Watch the video, he says that the new abilities have replaced the mage books.
What do you think has happened to ancients/lunar, etc
Also, if you watch the entire video, you'll notice something that (if you're a bridder) will means lots of fun.

item.title: New combat - No mage books, some other info
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:15, topic:445287”]I think they’re making RS worse, but that’s just my opinion.[/quote]That’s just because you’ve grown out of it. We all miss it’s old style because it gives us good memories, the time where you were still exploring the game and was jumping of joy with your first 100k. It’s like that for any game, you eventually get bored no matter how they update it. People who have joined RS recently don’t have any problems with Jagex’s decisions.

It"s about time they did something to the combat and make it require skill instead of luck.

Read full topic
item.source: New combat - No mage books, some other info

Read full topic
item.source: New combat - No mage books, some other info

item.title: New combat - No mage books, some other info
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Ruby:

I think they’re making RS worse, but that’s just my opinion.

It’s really not a bad game, it’s now just a playground for little kids who get fool by eye-candy, shitty graphics and that have their parents pay for a $2000 computer and internet. I finally managed to play with a stable fps (after much, much loading), and found nothing but little kids who think they’re so fucking badass for buying gold and/or botting.

I’m now a noob for wearing classic armor like dragon. I was buying a couple things at the GE one day whilst wearing a dragon plate armor set, and this random guy walks up and calls me a noob for not spending 78478478 hours of my life to get a rapier (was using a whip) and ‘overspending’ on dragon instead of DH when I have 100M+ anyway.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

How does that remind you of WoW? It’s more like Dragon Age: Origins with the bar thing above the chatbox.

Because of how it allows people to set their spells and stuff in a box thing (above the chatbox in this case), and you are able to click on which you want to cast etc.

item.title: New combat - No mage books, some other info
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

RuneScape

Combat: Action and Adrenaline!

The Combat HQ has been updated with a whole host of information about the hotly anticipated action bar, and a new feature for the Evolution of Combat beta: adrenaline!

Watch the video, he says that the new abilities have replaced the mage books.

What do you think has happened to ancients/lunar, etc

Also, if you watch the entire video, you’ll notice something that (if you’re a bridder) will means lots of fun.

Read full topic
